event.name: Battlefield
event.description: The event continues until one of the teams is exterminated or times out.

event.name: Castle
event.description: Any player can join the event. You do not need to be inside a guild.

event.name: Last Man Standing
event.description: The event will start only with 5 players or more.

event.name: Zumbi
event.description: The event lasts until the last participant got killed. This one who will be the winner.
